author: Daniel Greene
description:
Welcome to Fantasy News, where I bring you the latest updates from the worlds of books, fantasy, and gaming! Thank you squarespace for sponsoring today's video: https://www.squarespace.com/danielgreene This week, we’ve got massive news, including a new Robin Hobb book, updates on Witcher 4, Elden Ring co-op spin-offs, and so much more. Plus, I’ll share updates on my own book, Better Dead.

📰 Stories Covered in This Episode

00:00 Book Updates

Better Dead 1st draft: Updates from me!
War of the Words audiobook now available:
https://thewaroftheworlds.backerkit.com/hosted_preorders
00:00 Wheel of Time Elaida Casting
Exciting news for Wheel of Time fans—Elida has been cast!
Full details: https://x.com/TheWheelOfTime/status/1866845487862554850?t=H7xOEdr7TIRCKpRnxbLudQ&s=19

02:54 New John Scalzi Book
John Scalzi’s The Shattering Peace announced!
More info: https://www.panmacmillan.com/authors/john-scalzi/the-shattering-peace/9781529082937

03:31 New Legends and Lattes
Travis Baldree anno
title: WHEEL OF TIME S3 CASTING!🧙‍♀️ New Robin Hobb ✍️ EVEN MORE BLACK COMPANY!🖤~FN~
